website_summaries.verdict: A generous-sized 12.5-inch bowl with beautifully layered wood, and each one is unique.
cons: Some reported cracks in the rim

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I got my bowl a few days ago and I absolutely love. Its a great quality, easy to clean and very nice looking. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl. Works great make sure to oil it once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set up. Even more beautiful in person, and the packaging as well.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and very functional wooden bowl. Great for salads!
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Great salad bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great salad bowl. Needed a small bowl to use in our motor home and this one filled the need. Salads are as good as the salads in our large $260 bowl we use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Margie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Exactly the size I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was very quick. Great product! Exactly the size I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: sarazhu

customer_reviews.title: Bowl cracks after usage...
customer_reviews.text: This bowl lasted approx 6 uses, after which the seams of the base split and the salad dressing started leaking through the bottom. A beautiful piece, we washed it gently avoiding soaps and hot water...but it cracked nonetheless. Disappointing. Kimberley
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after one use
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed. I gave two of these as gifts for Christmas; one to my daughter and her husband and one to my sister and brother-in-law. They were very pleased until after one use, BOTH salad bowls cracked!! This was after the return date had elapsed. So they’re totally unusable now. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: KAV

customer_reviews.title: Cracked upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get a new salad bowl after wanting one for so long. As soon as I opened it I spotted three or four large cracks in the bowl. Very disappointed and will be sending it back. Gave two stars because the salad serving spoon and fork seem to be nice. Sad I won’t get to use them.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: This item will be a Christmas gift. It is absolutely stunning. If I didn't already have my own, I would definitely order. I'm sure the recipient will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of wood. My wife loves it. I can't think of a reason to spend two or three times the amount for another wooden salad bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Armadillo

customer_reviews.title: Gift to myself
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a wooden salad set for a long time and saw this. I was super excited I've only used a couple times but absolutely loved it. But, ensure to follow the instructions given to enjoy this longer.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Pan

customer_reviews.title: Nice item but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Only use once after purchased. And noticed there is a crack on the edge already. Not sure it’s the temperature or bad one I got.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Big bowl
customer_reviews.text: Its very pretty, good quality, and It’s quite large, can maybe hold like 6-8 servings of salad! Unfortunately the fork arrived a little chipped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl! Always loved wooden bowls but the last one U bought actually cane apart. This one is sturdy, easy to clean and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bowl for my son and daughter in-law for their 5th anniversary. They love it! It is a very attractive bowl and the wood has a lot of depth and color. I plan on purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality wooden salad bowl
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations in terms of quality. Beautiful satiny wood, color as pictured, smooth seams, well crafted, packaged correctly and with care to avoid damage. Can be used as a decorative piece as well as serving. Gave as a gift, recipient loved it. In addition, set includes wooden salad serving utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive and seems well made. It is a perfect size for 2 to 4 which is the size I wanted. The only negative is the salad tongs that came with it were not of the same wood or high quality but that is a small quibble. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy O.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This bowl makes my family eats salads more often 😂
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had this salad bowl and serving utensils for one year and use it at least three times a week. The set is holding up very well and still looks like new. I gently hand wash it and dry it within 4 hours of finishing the meal. The serving utensils are thin which makes scooping up the salad easier. Very attractive set.
customer_reviews.author: David L H

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl and spoon set. We love the look and its perfect to serve from.
customer_reviews.author: SKILL1833

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to eat salad!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 😍! This bowl just arrived and I just wanted to note upon first inspection there's no chips or cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Candice B

customer_reviews.title: consumer king
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing that the mixing tongs faded already - the tine on the fork is so fragile that it simply broke! All we use this for is salad tossing and we took care of it - no dishwasher and gentle washing. Too bad because the bowl is quite nice looking and good size.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer King

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them as salad, pasta, and fruit bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Tami tam

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases ever on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was a steal. Needed a nice salad bowl and this one is great. I get compliments on it. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: David P Shick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous bowl
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous bowl, I have no issues and have had endless compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther Nidra

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my Daughter for Christmas and she loves it. very well made and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The perfect size for our family of four.
customer_reviews.author: Qui Carp

customer_reviews.title: Nice acai wood salad bowl
customer_reviews.text: This salad bowl is amazing!!! I loved use it every time when our family making salad. It is a nice finished wood with patterns. This is the second time I purchased it. And this time I will giving it to my brother in law as a Xmas gift. I believed his family will enjoyed it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY WOODEN BOWL SET
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a solid set of wooden bowls, serving bowl and utensils. Saw this product on lightning deals and took a chance. Love it so much I bought another set of four! Plus I love acacia wood! So beautiful in the color variations and only improves when oiled regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift and now want to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Love this bowl. Beautiful. But wood cracked within 6 months, and there is no way to contact the seller and Amazon customer service does not support this. Very disappointing, I wouldn't buy it again knowing this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Broken spoon
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package and one of the spoons was broken. I'm super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant touch for Salads
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this salad bowl. It’s beautiful on my table and I get lots of compliments when I serve salads. Very easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: The bowl and matching utensils look like good quality and aesthetically look nice. Gave them to wife for 5th anniversary wood themed gift and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salad Bowl and implements
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving two salad bowls as wedding gifts to family members. The bowl is beautiful as well as the implements with it. There will be lots of use and if cared for properly, will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cash

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and quality of the bowl
customer_reviews.text: I love the bowl, but the spoon is so thin, that's the only thing I didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: The bowl is the perfect size for a family of three!
customer_reviews.text: This salad bowl is beautiful. It is the perfect size for a family of three. It cleans easily. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sutorius

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Salad bowl is nicely made and the wood is lighter weight than others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just want the replacement of one item (fork)
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and the fork is broken or defective.
customer_reviews.author: Alma A Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Beautiful wood, very well made. I only wish there were small bowl set to go with it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece for the price. Very light in weight which is good for me since they go up on a higher shelf.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was an excellent choice! I had found a similar bowl at Crate and Barrel, but I couldn't get it here by Christmas. I found this bowl on Amazon and after reading ALL the reviews and seeing a couple of pictures that people had posted I took a chance. The bowl is beautiful and just what my gift recipient was looking for. I appreciated seeing the pictures that someone had posted ; that had a great deal to do with my decision to purchase the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Updike

customer_reviews.title: My BFF loved it
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was a gift for my friend and she loved it. It looks great. It's definitely sturdy and I'm sure its easy to clean. I liked that it also included the serving utensils. Perfec!
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowl! Can’t belive the cost for the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bowl! Can’t belive the cost for the quality you get. I’ve seen similar bowls for over 100!!! Looks even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Quikksilver

customer_reviews.title: Great salad bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl for any family get togethers. Great bowl for salad. Easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, beautiful, and looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: I am proud of this bowl set when I attend potlucks or when guest are over. It looks expensive. It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: prop0017

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A friend had bought me asalad bowl similar to this a few years ago but it split just recently and I replaced it with this one. I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Line

customer_reviews.title: Well made, beautiful bowl
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 sets for Christmas gifts this year. Everyone loved them, they thought they are beautiful bowls, large enough for a family.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bowl
customer_reviews.text: I got this bowl as a gift for my mother. It is absolutely beautiful and of good quality. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful nice size too
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a beauty! Nice big size for family dinners
customer_reviews.author: carol A.

product_meta.title: Acacia Wooden Salad Bowl Set - 12.5Inch Hardwood with Servers Set Big Salad Bowls 3-Piece Set by AIDEA - Best Christmas Gift
feature_bullets: 🍒【SIZE】The bowls set includes 1 large salad bowl and 2 serving spoon and fork. Bowl measures 12.5inch in diameter , 5inch height. Servers Measures 11.5inch.

🍒【NATURAL AND UNIQUE】100% Hand crafted from richly grained acacia hardwood makes each piece unique. Beautiful colors without a stain may vary slightly and effect in temperature, humidity and dryness due to natural wood construction. Matching servers are contoured for easy tossing and serving.

🍒【MORE THAN SIMPLE】Simple and elegant piece with multiple-use naturally suited to everyday use. Perfect for green salad, pasta, bread, fruit, cereal or movie-night popcorn and even as artful display or a kitchen or centerpiece decoration, almost everything even for photograph a new born baby.

🍒【HEATHY AND VERSATILE】Tested and healthy food-safe lacquer top-coat protects the wood and easy cleanup. Hand washing only with mild soapy warm water and dry thoroughly after every time use. Wipe with oil for daily maintaining for lifetime use.

🍒【BEST SERVICE】DO NOT put in dishwasher, microwave, freezer or oven. Keep away from heat and sunlight, storage in a well-ventilated place. The acacia wooden bowl set will come boxed in AIDEA branded packaging for a gift-friendly presentation and fulfilled by Amazon. We back our products with a full one-year warranty against any defective workmanship.
